¿Quieres formar parte del #TeamPanel? Buscamos incorporar a nuestro equipo una persona DevOps Integrador para formar parte de un proyecto en el que trabajamos aportando valor añadido a uno de nuestros grandes clientes (operadora de telefonía móvil a nivel nacional).

Requisitos de la oferta...
- Amplia experiencia en DevOps: profundo conocimiento de las prácticas y principios de DevOps, incluyendo la integración continua (CI) y la entrega continua (CD), infraestructura como código (IaC), automatización de pruebas, y monitoreo.
- Experiencia multiplataforma: aunque el enfoque es GCP, el arquitecto debe tener experiencia en múltiples plataformas de nube (como AWS, Azure, etc.) para asegurar un enfoque agnóstico en la arquitectura y las herramientas utilizadas.
- Herramientas de CI/CD: dominio en herramientas de integración y despliegue continuo, como Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions, y Cloud Build, con la habilidad de adaptar estos procesos en distintos entornos de nube.
- Infraestructura como Código (IaC): experiencia con herramientas como Terraform, CloudFormation (para AWS), y Deployment Manager (para GCP), permitiendo la gestión agnóstica de infraestructuras.
- Contenedores y orquestación: conocimientos sólidos en Docker y Kubernetes, incluido Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), para gestionar contenedores de manera eficiente en diferentes plataformas de nube.
- Monitorización y logging: habilidad para implementar soluciones de monitorización y logging que pueden ser utilizadas a través de plataformas, como Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana), y las herramientas nativas de GCP como Cloud Monitoring y Cloud Logging.
- Seguridad DevOps (DevSecOps): comprensión de cómo integrar prácticas de seguridad en el ciclo de vida de desarrollo y despliegue de aplicaciones (SDLC), asegurando que las soluciones sean seguras por diseño.
- Inglés: B2

Lugar de trabajo...
Remoto con presencialidad puntual en las oficinas de Madrid
Horario: L-V 8h, inicio a las 9:00AM con flexibilidad para entrar de +/- 30 minutos

Políticas de conciliación como el Teletrabajo en modo full-remote; jornada continua los viernes y en verano, flexibilidad horaria, días de permiso en navidad, y facilidades para la movilidad geográfica de los empleados.

Hey there, future innovator! At Creaitor we’re reshaping the way companies manage their content marketing. Since 2022 we’ve been building the leading AI-driven platform to help businesses streamline their entire content marketing lifecycle. We’re at home in beautiful Lucerne, Switzerland but our growing team mostly works remotly to build amazing AI solutions for customers all over the world.
We’re fresh off of closing our pre-seed financing round and are ready to kick our growth into high gear by welcoming new team members with exceptional talent to grow Creaitor to the preferred AI Content Marketing platform for businesses worldwide.

- As a Business Requirement Analyst you will be working side-by-side with Creaitor’s founders supporting the process of translating Creaitor’s vision into a detailed product roadmap.

- You’ll work closely with our Product Owner and UX / Design expert to break down the roadmap into actionable requirements and development tasks.

- You’ll be responsible for creating concepts for new features or improvements of existing features based on customer’s feedback.

- The concepts and requirements you create with clear, detailed feature descriptions and instructions will ensure a seamless transition to the development team for implementation and subsequent acceptance testing.


Requirements

- You have excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and are able to clearly articulate complex concepts in writing. Any German language skills you might have would be a big plus!

- You have a solid understanding of generative AI and SaaS platform design and development. Ideally you’ve worked in a SaaS environment before.

- Strong ability to translate business needs into innovate technical solutions using wireframes, mockups and process design.

- You have a solid unserstanding of web development and web application integrations and ideally have experience working in a SaaS product environment.

- Experience with content marketing and search engine optimization (SEO) would be a big plus.


Benefits

- Work remotely while being an indispensable member of our global team. You’ll have all the tools at your disposal to fascilitae communication and a great work environment.

- Work at the heart of a growing AI startup with a unique culture and ambitions to match your own.

- We are result driven and give you the space and flexibility to organize your work as it best suits you.

- Get the opportunity to be a co-owner of a successfull startup with Creaitor’s Employee Stock Options Program.

- Be part of the initial scaling team and shape the future of Creaitor with us.

Buscamos 5 Desarrolladores Back-End para unirse a nuestro equipo de I+D en proyectos de ciberseguridad.
Los candidatos deberán tener experiencia en el desarrollo de aplicaciones web, así como en el diseño y desarrollo de APIs, con un enfoque en arquitecturas de microservicios y serverless en AWS.
Tareas

- Colaborar con los expertos en ciberseguridad para diseñar e implementar soluciones innovadoras.

- Desarrollar y mantener aplicaciones web, siguiendo las mejores prácticas de seguridad.

- Diseñar, desarrollar y documentar APIs RESTful y GraphQL para permitir la integración y comunicación entre diferentes componentes y sistemas.

- Participar en la arquitectura y diseño de microservicios y funciones serverless en AWS, asegurando la escalabilidad, y disponibilidad de las soluciones.

- Implementar y optimizar flujos de integración y entrega continua (CI/CD) utilizando herramientas como Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions o AWS CodePipeline.

- Colaborar en la definición y evolución de las arquitecturas de datos y almacenamiento, incluyendo bases de datos relacionales, NoSQL y sistemas de Big Data.

- Participar en la revisión de código y en las pruebas QA para asegurar la entrega de software.

- Mantenerse actualizado con las últimas tendencias y tecnologías en desarrollo web, APIs y seguridad.


Requisitos

- Título universitario o equivalente en Informática, Ingeniería de Software, Ciberseguridad o un campo relacionado. Se valorará un posgrado, doctorado o certificaciones relevantes.

- Al menos 5 años de experiencia en desarrollo web y API, con un sólido conocimiento de lenguajes como JavaScript, Python y Node.js.

- Dominio del Español e Inglés nivel alto hablado y escrito.

- Experiencia en el desarrollo de aplicaciones utilizando frameworks frontend como React, Angular o Vue.js.

- Experiencia en el diseño y desarrollo de APIs RESTful y GraphQL utilizando Node.js, Express, Django o Spring Boot.

- Amplios conocimientos de arquitecturas de microservicios y serverless, con experiencia en el desarrollo y despliegue de aplicaciones en AWS.

- Familiaridad con contenedores y orquestación usando tecnologías como Docker, Kubernetes o AWS ECS/Fargate.

- Experiencia en el uso de bases de datos relacionales (PostgreSQL, MySQL) y NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra, DynamoDB).

- Conocimientos de seguridad web y API, incluyendo autenticación, autorización, encriptación y protección contra vulnerabilidades comunes (OWASP Top 10).

- Experiencia en la implementación de pipelines de CI/CD y en la automatización de pruebas unitarias, funcionales, de integración y despliegue.


Beneficios

- Incorporación inmediata con contrato indefinido.

Job Description
Hi there!

We are Semrush, a global IT company developing our own product – a platform for digital marketers. New stars are born here, so don’t miss your chance.

Our role IT Risk Analyst for those who value interaction with customers, understand risk management and develop and maintain the risk registry for Infrastructure Division
Tasks in the role are include:

- Develop and maintain the risk registry for the infrastructure division, ensuring it is comprehensive and up-to-date. Transforming our risk registry from qualitative to quantitative risk analysis

- Risk Assessment: Analyse statistical data to estimate the probability, severity and cost of realised threats on infrastructure assets

- Data Collection and Cleaning: Gathering data from various sources and ensuring it is accurate and usable. Participation in M&A due diligence audits for external companies

- Data Analysis and Interpretation: Applying statistical methods and machine learning algorithms to interpret data. Use software to analyze data and run simulations to predict future trends and outcomes

- Model Building: Creating predictive models and algorithms to analyze data trends and patterns

- Validation and Testing: Ensuring the accuracy and validity of models through rigorous testing

- Communication: Presenting findings in a comprehensible manner to stakeholders, often through visualizations and reports

- Financial Modelling: Create and use mathematical models to develop strategies and models for financial planning to evaluate investment decisions, distribute and forecast costs

- Advisory Duties: Provide expert advice to other Platform infrastructure teams


Requirements
Who we are looking for:

- Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field. A Master’s degree is a plus

- 2+ years of experience in data analysis, business intelligence, or a related field

- 3+ years of experience in risk evaluation, ideally within the IT infrastructure and/or cybersecurity sector

- Possess h2 knowledge of risk management frameworks and best practices

- Proven track record of managing multiple projects and priorities in a fast-paced environment

- Familiarity with regulatory requirements and IT industry standards related to risk management

- Understanding of Industry Regulations: Knowledge of relevant laws, regulations, and best practices in the industry

- Knowledge of data visualisation and BI tools such as Tableau

- Excellent communication skills with the ability to present data-driven insights to non-technical stakeholders

- Significant experience with statistical analysis techniques, tools and predictive modelling

- Excellent documentation skills - clear, visual and understandable artefacts

- Analytical Skills: Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills as well as ability to think strategically

- Strong attention to detail, critical thinking, time management, and the ability to work both independently and as part of a team

- English at B2 level or above


They say there are no perfect candidates, but that might well be you, if you have:

- Solid foundation in math, probability theory, and statistics

- Good knowledge of SQL

- Python knowledge or other programming language

- Great Excel skills

- You share our common values: Trust, because we prefer to speak up and be our true selves; Sense of Ownership, because it’s not worth wasting time on something you don’t believe in; and enthusiasm for Constant Changes, because we are always looking to make things better


- It’s up to you to decide what work format works best for you. You can #wfo, #wfh, or mix both

- Flexible working day start

- Unlimited PTO

- Hobby benefit

- Breakfast, snacks, and coffee at the office

- Corporate events

- Training, courses, conferences

- Gifts for employees

- Individuelle Entwicklung: Innovative Lösungen schaffen, mit denen wir die Bedürfnisse und Probleme unserer Kunden befriedigen.

- Reibungslose Prozesse: Nahtlose Anbindung von Drittsystemen wie ERP, PIM oder CRM an Softwaresysteme, um einen reibungslosen Ablauf für unsere Projekte zu schaffen.

- Implementierung von Anforderungen: Setze konzeptionierte Anforderungen in hochwertigen Code um und erwecke komplexe Projektideen zum Leben.

- Überprüfung und Qualitätssicherung: Überprüfe und bewerten die Arbeit des Teams, um sicherzustellen, dass jedes Projekt den höchsten Qualitätsstandards entspricht.


Qualifikation

- Mehr als 5 Jahre Erfahrung in der PHP-Entwicklung

- Mehr als 2 Jahre Erfahrung in der Entwicklung mit einem der folgenden Systeme: Shopware, Shopify, Sylius oder Spryker

- Du kannst Probleme analysieren und Lösungen definieren

- Reine Remote-Arbeit ist für dich kein Problem

- Du arbeitest selbständig und hast einen hohen Anspruch an die Qualität deiner eigenen Arbeit

- Du sprichst und schreibst fließend Deutsch


Optional:

- Du sprichst und schreibst fließend Englisch


Benefits

- Remote Only: Alle unsere Strukturen und Abläufe sind so gestaltet, dass du arbeiten kannst, wo immer du willst. Ob von zu Hause, einem Café oder sogar vom Büro in Palma aus.

- Asynchrone Arbeitsweise: Wir arbeiten zeitlich asynchron und du hast, abgesehen von deinen wenigen festen Terminen, keine Vorgaben, wann du arbeitest.

- Ausbildungsbudget: Wir haben ein festes Budget mit Tagen, über das du jedes Jahr frei verfügen kannst. Wenn dein Training mehr Budget und mehr Tage benötigt, sprechen wir einfach darüber und finden eine Lösung.

- Ausrüstung: Wir kümmern uns in Absprache mit dir um deine Ausrüstung zu Hause, damit du dich wohlfühlst und ohne Probleme arbeiten kannst.Weitere Vorteile: Fitnessstudio-Beitrag, Teilnahme an Messen und Konferenzen, Firmenevents auf Mallorca und vieles mehr.

Motoreto, a four-year-old company, provides solutions for the B2B automotive sector. Our newest SaaS platform streamlines stock management and delivers precise market insights to car dealers across Europe.
With consistent monthly growth, we now serve over 100 businesses. We´re ready to invest further in our product and tech foundations to enhance our offering´s quality and extend our market reach.
Tasks

- Dive into data: be our go-to data person, taking on data-related aspects of the app with a proactive and impactful approach.

- Data analysis: help analyze large datasets to uncover trends, patterns, and anomalies related to used vehicle pricing.

- Model development: help develop models to standardize and predict market information.

- Validation: assist in designing steps to validate and report the accuracy and effectiveness of our models.

- Data pipelines: learn to build and automate data pipelines for efficient data processing and cleaning.

- Collaboration: work with our engineering team to deploy models into our SaaS platform.

- Web Scraping: improve data collection methods through web scraping to ensure high-quality data.

- Insights: provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis to help guide business decisions and strategy.


Requirements

- Learning attitude: we´re more interested in your enthusiasm and willingness to learn than years of experience or diplomas.

- Humble, curious and eager to get things done.

- Passion for the job: any experience in data science and machine learning is a plus — side projects count!

- Programming skills: basic knowledge of Python (preferred), R, or similar languages.

- Statistical skills: understanding of statistical analysis and machine learning techniques. Knowledge of Natural Language Processing (NLP) is a plus.

- SQL knowledge: familiarity with SQL; experience with database management is a bonus.

- Web scraping: familiarity with web scraping techniques and tools is helpful.

- Professional working proficiency in English and Spanish.


Benefits
Team dynamic

- We are a small, efficient tech team consisting of a full-stack engineer, a front-end developer, and a product/design specialist.

- Our size allows us to avoid complexities and politics, focusing instead on clear communication and mutual respect for each other´s opinions and expertise.

- We work asynchronously most of the time and operate 100% remotely.

- We are committed to steady growth, valuing our colleagues and delivering high-quality work without compromising personal lives or mental health.

- Most importantly, we enjoy working and building things together. We are looking for a colleague who shares our passion for owning the product and continuously improving it.


Our offer

- A small team environment with easy communication and plenty of room for making big decisions.

- 100% remote work, and you can work from our offices in Getafe, Madrid whenever you want.

- Flexible working hours.

- Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.

- A vibrant and inclusive company culture.

- Free tickets to C.D. Leganés matches in La Liga.

- Free VIP tickets to Atlético de Madrid matches in La Liga.

- A 3-month paid internship with the potential for a contract offer afterward, based on your performance.


😉 Don´t worry if you don´t meet every single requirement. If you´re passionate about what you do and eager to learn, we encourage you to apply! We believe that diverse perspectives and experiences make our team stronger.

best possible team to give our customers the best support. We need a 3rd Line Support
Engineer to support our clients based on the US.

The successful candidate will have a proactive nature and fire prevention not firefighting
mentality. As a business we are good at firefighting but where we need people to help
management is to make sure we document process, focus more on procedure, and perform
root cause analysis. An ideal candidate would enjoy working on plans to make sure that
incidents do not repeat themselves

- Have demonstrable technical knowledge and support capabilities across Windows 7
& 10 Desktop, MS Office suite and Active Directory support.

- Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 / 2016 / 2019
- Virtualisation technologies including VMware and Microsoft Hyper-V
- Shared storage platforms (SAN’s)

- Have knowledge of ITIL, PRINCE 2 or Agile working methodologies. knowledge of developing maintenance and actions scripts using PowerShell, VB Script etc.
- Able to support Cisco based networking and services such as ASA Firewalls, IOS-XE, Prime, CMX.

The Package

- Competitive salary (dependent on your experience)
- Part of a happy team that is focused on providing great support.
- Exposure to multiple clients and technology

This is an exciting opportunity to join a hugely successful company that always works with the latest technology and strives for excellence. If you feel you are ready to make a real difference and have the right attributes for this role, have the ambition to excel, please apply.

Job Description
Hi there!

We are Semrush, a global IT company developing our own product – a platform for digital marketers. New stars are born here, so don’t miss your chance.

This is our role Product Designer for those who

UX: create hypotheses and test them, are not afraid to experiment and learn new things.

UI: know how to turn a mix of animations, pictures, buttons, fonts and colors into a great interface
Tasks in the role

- Working with the team to create and improve user engagement with the product. You’ll need to defend your decisions and participate in discussions and planning

- Conducting UX research, communicating with internal users, and conducting usability tests

- Monitor statistics and propose hypotheses to elevate user experience and contribute to business growth

- Creating adaptive pages and product interfaces based on the design system

- Collaborate with other Semrush teams, product management, and marketers

- Supervise design implementation with software developers


Requirements
Who we are looking for

- 3+ years in design

- A proven track record in creating great experiences and a portfolio that shows your creativity in solving complex problems with well-thought designs

- Experience working with product managers and engineering to design and ship features iteratively

- Strong knowledge of Figma

- Basic understanding of page layout

- Experience with design systems/guides/UI kit

- Strong sense of individual initiative and ability to lean into and learn new concepts

- Strong prioritization, organization, and personal management skills

- English level—intermediate or higher


They say there are no perfect candidates, but that might well be you, if

- You have experience in UX research

- Ability to look through the data in Google Analytics and formulate hypotheses based on it

- You share our common values: Trust, because we prefer to speak up and be our true selves; Sense of Ownership, because it’s not worth wasting time on something you don’t believe in; and enthusiasm for Constant Changes, because we are always looking to make things better


We will try to create all the right conditions for you to work and rest comfortably

- It’s up to you to decide what work format works best for you. You can #wfo, #wfh, or mix both.

- Flexible working day start

- Unlimited PTO

- Hobby benefit

- Breakfast, snacks, and coffee at the office

- Corporate events

- Training, courses, conferences

- Gifts for employees


Finally, a little more about our company
We’ve been developing our product for 15 years and have been awarded G2´s Top 100 Software Products, Global and US Search Awards 2021, Great Place to Work Certification, Deloitte Technology Fast 500 and many more. In March 2021 Semrush went public and started trading on the NYSE with the SEMR ticker.
10,000,000+ users in America, Europe, Asia, and Australia have already tried Semrush, and over 1,000 people around the world are working on its development. The Semrush team is constantly growing.

Tether, the founder of the first, largest, and most widely used stablecoin USD₮, is rapidly expanding into a wide range of sectors, including secure and unstoppable communication technologies, energy production, mining, and further fintech infrastructure. All of these themes share and are deeply rooted in the principles of Bitcoin, which include decentralization, resilience, openness, freedom, security, and scalability.
Tether stablecoins are used to power a wide variety of enterprises, including exchanges, wallets, payment processors, and financial services, by facilitating the use of reserve-backed tokens across blockchain networks. Tether stablecoins offer a global, secure, and instant means of storing, transmitting, and receiving digital tokens at a fraction of the cost of alternative traditional financial solutions. Unwavering transparency is of paramount importance and central to Tether´s foundational principles.
Our dynamic team operates entirely remotely, uniting talent from every corner of the globe. Our journey has been marked by rapid growth and efficient operations, firmly establishing us as pioneers within the industry.
If you possess a passion for venturing into uncharted territory and believe in your ability to conquer even the most formidable challenges, we eagerly invite you to engage with us. Join our mission, and together, let´s lay the groundwork for a decentralized future that reshapes industries far beyond the realm of stablecoins.

Tasks
As a Senior Backend Developer, you will be a part of the team that works on the development of Tether backend components
New Products and Features - Tether continuously strives to create innovative new features in order to provide the most professional trading experience for customers. These are developed and deployed using agile methodologies, to ensure the user experience remains the best in the industry.
Scalability - all backend services that power Tether must remain effortlessly smooth, responsive, and real-time for customers as the platform continues to scale to accommodate new user growth.
Security - Security is the most important feature. The Backend Development team is responsible for building all the services and core processes with the highest security principles and standard, in order to protect the safety of the entire user base.

-Data structures (binary trees, linked lists, graphs)

Nice to have

- Comfortable with high-availability concepts

- Ruby, Rust or C++ skills are a plus
